div.p: N78/8571, unit 1022, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
To the honorable the Chief Secretary.

I have the honor to solicit, that you will instruct the Gov. Printer to print 3000 copies of the work,
See J. Ferres to M, 14 August 1878. now by your permission under the press, on all the native plants of Victoria; this number will enable us to provide each state-school with one copy and leave a sufficient number of copies for sale, and also if desired for the Mechanics Institutes and free libraries &c. It would in my opinion be a pity, if the types of a work like this were dispersed with less than 3000 copies being drawn off.
On 19 August 1878 the Under Secretary, W. Odgers, minuted approval of M's request. This was noted by the Government Printer, J. Ferres, on 20 August. See also M to G. Berry, 23 May 1878.
